data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningText1
data.value: This plugin automatically modifies your game settings based on your configuration.

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningText2
data.value: The developer has worked hard to minimize the risk of data loss due to bugs or crashes; However, you should still make regular backups using the official configuration backup tool (available in the character menu) while using this plugin.

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningText3
data.value: It's crucial that you back up your settings frequently to prevent any potential issues.

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningText4
data.value: You will not be able to use this plugin until you've made at least one server backup. This is to ensure your settings can be restored if necessary.

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningText5
data.value: By continuing, you acknowledge the risks and agree to regularly back up your settings as advised.

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningBackupRequired
data.value: You must create a server backup before proceeding.

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningContinueButton
data.value: I acknowledge the risks and wish to continue

data.name: UI_Configuration_WarningContinueHint
data.value: Hold 'Left Shift' to activate the button

data.name: UI_Configuration_SettingsType_Zone_Description
data.value:
Changing a setting you have overwritten in this zone via the in-game options menu will only apply temporarily and will not be saved.
Changing any setting you have not overwritten will apply to your global game configuration as normal.

data.name: UI_Configuration_SettingsType_Game_Description
data.value: All changes to your settings will work as normal.

data.name: UI_Configuration_ZoneConfig_DeleteButton_Hint
data.value: Hold 'Left Shift' to enable deletion. Your original settings will be automatically reapplied.

data.name: UI_Configuration_ZoneConfig_ResetToDefault
data.value: Reset this option to its original value
